#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int fourst(int d[])
{
        if((d[0]+1==d[1] && d[1]+1==d[2] && d[2]+1==d[3]) || 
        (d[1]+1==d[2] && d[2]+1==d[3] && d[3]+1==d[4]))
        return 1;
    return 0;
}

int fivest(int d[])
{
    if(d[0]+1==d[1] && d[1]+1==d[2] && d[2]+1==d[3] && d[3]+1==d[4])
    return 1;
    else
    return 0;
}

int main()
{
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int dice[5];        
        int max[12]={0};
        int c1=0,c2=0,c3=0,c4=0,c5=0,c6=0,ce=0,co=0,cf=0,css=0,cls=0,cy=0;
        for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
        {
            cin>>dice[i];
            switch(dice[i])
            {
                case 1: max[0]++;break;
                case 2: max[1]+=2;break;
                case 3: max[2]+=3;break;
                case 4: max[3]+=4;break;
                case 5: max[4]+=5;break;
                case 6: max[5]+=6;break;
            }
            if(dice[i]%2==0)
            max[6]+=dice[i];
            else
            max[7]+=dice[i];
        }
        sort(dice,dice+5);
        if(dice[0]==dice[4])
        max[8]=40;
        else if((dice[0]==dice[1] && dice[2]==dice[4]) || (dice[0]==dice[2] && dice[3]==dice[4]))
        max[9]=15;
        else if(fivest(dice)==1)
        max[10]=30;
        else if(fourst(dice)==1)
        max[11]=20;
        else
        ;
        sort(max,max+12);
        cout<<max[11]<<endl;
        
    }
    return 0;
}
